form.IN:
Množinska oblika samostalnika je običajno
fruit
, uporabljamo pa tudi
fruits
.

sense.def:
A fruit
je nekaj, kar zraste na drevesu ali grmu in vsebuje semena ali peško, obdano z užitno snovjo.
Fruit
je na primer jabolko, pomaranča in banana.

The fruit of an action
ali
the fruits of an action
so posledice nekega dejanja, največkrat dobre.

seg.quote: ...the fruit of his visits to China.
The fruits of our labours were tremendous.
The good work of this year will continue to bear fruit.
